channel.title: Next.js Starter Blog
channel.description: A blog created with Next.js and Tailwind.css
channel.item: https://barbu.cc/blog/why-you-should-or-shouldn-t-save-data-with-unity-s-player-prefs undefined https://barbu.cc/blog/why-you-should-or-shouldn-t-save-data-with-unity-s-player-prefs With Unity's PlayerPrefs class, you can have an easy-to-use interface that allows you to start persisting some data! The post Why you should (or shouldn’t) save data with Unity’s PlayerPrefs appeared first on LogRocket Blog. With Unity's PlayerPrefs class, you can have an easy-to-use interface that allows you to start persisting some data! The post Why you should (or shouldn’t) save data with Unity’s PlayerPrefs appeared first on LogRocket Blog. Tue, 19 Jul 2022 09:08:48 GMT george@barbu.cc (George Barbu) undefined

https://barbu.cc/blog/creating-split-otp-input-fields-in-react-native undefined https://barbu.cc/blog/creating-split-otp-input-fields-in-react-native OTPs can be a daunting task because of the TextInput required. We can split the display to create one box for each OTP digit. The post Creating split OTP input fields in React Native appeared first on LogRocket Blog.

https://barbu.cc/blog/build-3-d-visuals-in-vue-with-lunchbox-js undefined https://barbu.cc/blog/build-3-d-visuals-in-vue-with-lunchbox-js In this article, we introduce the core concepts of Lunchbox.js and demonstrate how to use this tool to create 3D visuals in Vue.
